WorkItem.ClosedComment: This can be accomplished with the '-c' compiler flag.
WorkItem.Description: I would like commenting done in Typescript is automatic transferred to the idomatic Javascript code which is generated.

Comments.Message:
I have just blogged about how to modify the .csproj file to accomplish this.
http://blorkfish.wordpress.com/2012/10/06/including-typescript-comments-in-generated-javascript/
